title: China’s Victory day military parade: why are Putin and Kim Jong-un there, and what is the ‘axis of upheaval’?
summary: Leaders from Russia, North Korea, and Iran are set to convene in Beijing, marking a significant meeting of what has been termed the "axis of upheaval." This gathering highlights strengthening ties among these nations amid global tensions. The meeting's outcomes could have substantial implications for international relations and security dynamics.

title: Manchester City land Donnarumma from PSG as Ederson heads for exit
summary: Manchester City has reached an agreement to purchase goalkeeper Gianluigi Donnarumma from Paris Saint-Germain. The transfer fee is reported to be approximately £30 million (€35 million). This move strengthens City's squad as they aim for further success.

title: Is record-breaking Djokovic robust enough to keep rolling back years?
summary: The 38-year-old athlete has reached the quarter-finals of the US Open. However, he has faced physical challenges in the later rounds of recent Grand Slam tournaments. Concerns about his ability to perform remain as the competition intensifies.

title: Newcastle complete £55m deal for striker Yoane Wissa from Brentford
summary: Newcastle has acquired striker Yoane Wissa from Brentford for £55 million. The transfer comes just a day after Wissa expressed frustration, accusing Brentford of "unduly standing in my way" regarding his move. This signing marks a significant addition to Newcastle's squad.
